definition: paternal aunt/husband's sister/husband's mother (old)/nun/for the time being (literary)

sentences.english: My younger sister. Look at your dirty face.
sentences.chinese: 我的小姑子呀，你看这小脸花的。

sentences.english: The girl burrowed under the blankets.
The little girls sang as they went.
sentences.chinese: 小姑娘们一边走，一边唱。
我喜欢会说话的小姑娘。

sentences.english: The teacher likes this honey-lipped little girl very much.
sentences.chinese: 老师很喜欢这个嘴甜的小姑娘。

sentences.english: At the sight of the snake, the little girl cried.
sentences.chinese: 一见到那条蛇，那小姑娘就吓哭了。

sentences.english: Marimba smiled at the little girl.
The tricky street pedlar cheated the girl into giving him all her money.
sentences.chinese: 狡猾的摊贩把小姑娘的钱全骗走了。

sentences.english: The little girl has lost her fear of the dark.
sentences.chinese: 小姑娘不再害怕黑暗了。

sentences.english: The little girl was dwarfed by malnutrition(or under nutrition)。
sentences.chinese: 这小姑娘因营养不良而长不高。

sentences.english: Many times brides were very young girls and, therefore, small in stature.
sentences.chinese: 许多新娘都是非常年轻的小姑娘，所以，身材也娇小。

sentences.english: The girl clasped the doll tightly.
sentences.chinese: 小姑娘紧紧抱着洋娃娃。

sentences.english: Little girl, you go on dancing in your new friend's arms.
sentences.chinese: 小姑娘，你在新友的怀抱里继续跳舞。

sentences.english: Uncles son thought that his wife to her meal delivery to people , and ate.
sentences.chinese: 小姑子还以为是自己嫂子让人给她送饭来的，就吃了。

sentences.english: In came a little girl, wearing a white skirt with long hair.
sentences.chinese: 进来了一个小姑娘，梳着长辫子，穿白色裙子。

sentences.english: Blue Joe lets what husband's younger sister to wages, begin dibble.
sentences.chinese: 蓝乔让何小姑给了工钱，就开始播种。

definition: wife of older male cousin via female line
paternal aunt/husband's sister/husband's mother (old)/nun/for the time being (literary)
erhua variant of 兒媳婦|儿媳妇[er2 xi2 fu5]
(informal) grandma (paternal grandmother)/(respectful) mistress of the house/CL:位[wei4]/(coll.) boobies/breasts
older female cousin via female line
